14,Verify Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 Product Page,"Navigate to home, select the brand, and verify the product page for Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link brand (Samsung) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on link samsungGalaxyZFold4 -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High,NEW
10,Purchase Apple Product with Increased Storage Options,Navigate to the homepage, select an Apple product, choose storage options, and place an order. Fill in shipping details and verify the homepage.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on button HotNewProduct
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOption (Storage512GB)
Step 6: Click on label storageColorOption (Green)
Step 7: Click on button Increased
Step 8: Click on button Buy
Step 9: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 10: Click on link GoToCart
Step 11: Fill in shipping details and proceed to payment
